metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4285 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
An illegal memory access flaw was found in the binutils package. Parsing an ELF file containing corrupt symbol version information may result in a denial of service. This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-16599.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-arc-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-source - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.40-2ubuntu1
libbinutils - 2.40-2ubuntu1
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.40-2ubuntu1
libctf0 - 2.40-2ubuntu1
libgprofng0 - 2.40-2ubuntu1
libsframe1 - 2.40-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

gdb - 13.2-1ubuntu1
gdb-multiarch - 13.2-1ubuntu1
gdb-source - 13.2-1ubuntu1
gdbserver - 13.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. rodrigo-zaiden> versions earlier than 2.35 are not affected.

criterions.comment: binutils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40-2ubuntu1').
binutils-avr package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
gdb package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '13.2-1ubuntu1').
